document.full_text: prosecutors on tuesday decided against filing a battery charge against lindsay lohan that might have sent the troubled actress to jail over a confrontation at california's betty ford center rehab clinic.
document.title: lindsay lohan avoids criminal charge in betty ford quarrel
lines_and_colors: prosecutors on tuesday decided against filing a battery charge against lindsay lohan that might have sent the troubled actress to jail over a confrontation at california's betty ford center rehab clinic.
